translation.en: are literally about to drive off into the sunset together.
translation.ko: 그나저나 쟤네들 지금 선셋 쪽으로 드라이브 가나 봐

translation.en: [Morf] Gita?
-Yes. -Hi.
-I'm Morf Vande-- -Vandewalt.
-Yes. -Of course. I've read you for years.
translation.ko: - 네 - 수년 동안 당신 비평을 읽었어요

translation.en: Yes. [mutters]
Are those the new Persols?
Yeah. That's right.
That's a Freud.
-Yes, it is. -I've never seen that one before.
translation.ko: - 네, 맞아요 - 저건 본 적이 없어요

translation.en: It's been in a crate since '92.
And it's going back in one.
I loved your exhibit brochure on Dease, by the way.
translation.ko: 참, 디즈 전시회 안내서가 아주 좋더군요

translation.en: Thank you.
As I said on the phone, I'm expanding it into a book.
translation.ko: 전화로 얘기한 것처럼 책으로 확장하고 있어요

translation.en: Well, there's enough there for one.
You cataloged the collection presale.
Oh, not cataloged.
My primary focus became Dease's distinctive methodology.
translation.ko: 디즈의 독특한 기법을 연구하는 데 집중했어요

translation.en: I spent three weeks identifying conventions, workflow, classifications.
translation.ko: 지난 3주 동안 기법, 작업 방식 유형 등을 확인했어요

translation.en: It was almost impossible to delineate between working materials and
translation.ko: 작품 재료와 개인 소품 간의 차이를 설명하는 게

translation.en: personal effects.
Frankly, I was glad to finish.
Well, I wasn't aware there were any personal effects
besides the ones in my possession.
translation.ko: 다른 개인 소품이 있는 줄 몰랐네요

translation.en: None in a traditional sense.
I mean, as in tissue.
Paper?
Perhaps you should speak with Rhodora.
Rhodora is...
backing the book.
I have her full support and confidence, of course.
Tissue as in blood serum.
The artist's, I assume.
He used it to create the reddish blacks and the shadows.
translation.ko: 붉은빛 도는 검정색과 그림자를 만들기 위해서 사용했어요

translation.en: It was in every piece we studied.
[Jim] That is an outrageous request. Even coming from you.
translation.ko: 그레천, 아무리 우리 사이라지만 이런 요청은 들어줄 수 없어

translation.en: I don't get your pushback on a Minkins
retrospective here, in the fall, of all his major works.
translation.ko: 주요 작품을 소개하는 게 왜 안 된다는 거야

translation.en: We already agreed to put up Sphere
in exchange for you bringing us twelve Dease.
Seriously, Gretchen, it's rude and dumb. If you wanted to ram more
translation.ko: 이건 무례하고 바보스러운 행동이야 고객의 소장품을 우리한테 더 떠넘기고

translation.en: of your collector's hoard down our throats to increase their value,
translation.ko: 고객의 소장품을 우리한테 더 떠넘기고 값을 올릴 속셈이었으면

translation.en: you should have done so before the Dease deal was locked,
not the night before the exhibit's open.
translation.ko: 전시회 전날에 이러는 게 어디 있어?

translation.en: I hear marketing has high hopes of a traveling Dease collection.
translation.ko: 마케팅 팀에서 디즈 컬렉션을 순회 전시하고 싶어한다던데

translation.en: They've even run projections.
[inhales] So, I believe my "leverage" looking ahead is considerable.
translation.ko: 그럼 내 '영향력'이 앞으로 상당할 것 같은데

translation.en: There's absolutely no space in the fall to put on a Minkins show.
translation.ko: 가을에 민킨스 전시회를 열 공간이 진짜로 없어

translation.en: Well, I'm going to meet with your board tomorrow

translation.en: They don't sell any tickets anyway.
-Over my dead body. -[sighs]
translation.ko: 내 눈에 흙이 들어가기 전에는 안 돼

translation.en: [Coco] Um, Gretchen?
The hard copy PR material's been sorted,

translation.ko: 디지털 홍보 자료는 자정에 전송될 예정입니다

translation.en: Be here early.
And inform me of any celebrities or art stars.
Um, if it's all right with you, I'd like to go home
and get a few hours of sleep?
Has the lighting been corrected on Sphere?
Oh, the side lights, yes. I had them leave it lit,
translation.ko: 네, 사이드 조명 고쳤어요 가시면서 확인해보시라고 켜놓았어요

translation.en: so you could see it when you leave.
Then run along.
[Coco] Good night.
Help!
Hello.
No.
When?
This morning.
Somehow she got stuck inside of it.
There was some kind of malfunction, and I guess it just, like,
completely took her arm off and she bled to death.
translation.ko: 팔이 완전히 잘리고 과다 출혈로 사망했어요

translation.en: It was horrible.
Security guards thought it was part of a new installation,
so they just opened up and let people in.
The Dease pop-up announcement was blasted last night,
translation.ko: 디즈 전시회 팝업 홍보가 어젯밤부터 시작돼서

translation.en: so everyone was heading there.
People just walked by like she was part of an exhibit.
translation.ko: 전시회의 일부인 줄 알고 사람들이 그냥 지나쳤어요

translation.en: Then a school tour came along.
The kids thought it was fake blood,
so they just started stepping in it and spreading it around and...
Who knows how long it would have gone on for
until Coco came in to do press for the Dease show,
translation.ko: 코코가 디즈 전시회 홍보 일하러 왔다가

translation.en: and she saw Gretchen and just lost it.
Are you still there?
Rhodora?
I don't understand.
Bryson, then Jon. Now Gretchen.
What the fuck is going on?
I don't know.
I mean, we just saw her last night.
They closed that wing of the museum, but...
I hear the Dease exhibit is mobbed.
-Hey. Go. -[meows]
We're spiking on Moments and Instagram. It's a major hit.
Rhodora, are you still there?
Did you hear what I just said?
Yeah.
The Dease exhibit is booming.
There's someone at my door. I gotta go.
Did you...
hear about Gretchen?
[crying] Did you?
-Oh, Jesus. -[exhales]
-Can you believe it? -You have to leave.
[shouts] You just can't, well, just walk in like this!
Well, I need to be with someone right now. I'd think you would, too.
translation.ko: 지금 같이 있을 사람이 필요해 너도 그럴 거라 생각했어

translation.en: What's going on?
Are you kidding me?
We're not together. I was clear.
You said, "a break."
The admiration I had for your work has completely evaporated!
translation.ko: 당신 작품에 대해 좋게 생각했던 거 다 취소요

translation.en: Hey, man, I wasn't trying to jump your train, okay?
translation.ko: 이봐요, 몰래 여자 친구를 뺐으려던 의도는 아니었어요

translation.en: She said you two were done.
Are we? Are we?
Say we don't share something real.
I was never particularly obsessed.
Oh!
We expected you yesterday.
We closed the exhibit for half a day in anticipation, actually.
I thought Artweb were clear on the timing.
translation.ko: 아트웹이 시간에 대해 정확히 아는 줄 알았어요

translation.en: I know, I'm sorry. It's my fault.
I know it's pre-debut.
Just been experiencing some personal matters.
Then, of course, Gretchen this morning.
translation.ko: 그리고 오늘 아침에 그레천 사고도 있었고요

translation.en: -If this isn't a good time... -No, it's fine.
It's overdue.
-I'll write my review and file it today. -Hmm.
Lillith Vanlandingham is storming the world
with her revolutionary sound exhibits.
She won the Nam June Paik Award last year. Her latest piece is called Mysticete.
translation.ko: 작년에 백남준 상도 받았고요 최근 작품은 '수염고래'예요

translation.en: As discussed, we have arranged for you to experience the exhibit alone.
translation.ko: 상의한 대로 전시회를 혼자 보실 수 있도록 준비했습니다

translation.en: [Morf] Look at him standing there.
He only embraces what he knows.
[male voice] Undoubtedly one of the worst exhibits of contemporary art history.
translation.ko: '의심의 여지 없이 현대 미술 역사상 최악의 전시회 중 하나야'

translation.en: [Morf] Piece for piece, it's the biggest waste of steel since the Titanic.
translation.ko: '한 점 한 점, 타이태닉호 이후로' '최고로 기억에 남을 강철의 낭비야'

translation.en: [male voice 2] This painful exhibit should be bulldozed.
translation.ko: '최고로 기억에 남을 강철의 낭비야' '이 끔찍한 전시회는 불도저로 밀어 버려야 해'

translation.en: [Morf] Remove the spotlight of hype and his latest work is a snoozefest.
translation.ko: '세간의 이목을 잊고 감상하면' '그의 최근 작품은 끔찍하게 지루하다'

translation.en: Seriously, Ms. Minati, I am talking to you.
[Morf] It seems you have no one around you to say this. Stop it.
translation.ko: '당신 주변에서 이런 얘기 해주는 사람들이 없나 봐요' '그만하세요'

translation.en: Shut up the shed.
There are no redeeming qualities to the show. Nothing but embarrassed--
translation.ko: '이 전시회에서는 만회하려는 노력이 안 보여요' '민망하기 그지 없네요'

translation.en: [male voice] The best thing about the show is the French rosé being offered.
[male voice 3] It's an ugly piece to look at, and faintly nauseating.
translation.ko: '너무 추해서 쳐다볼 수가 없어요, 속이 다 거북하네요'

translation.en: [Morf] It's gone from innocent and stupid...
[male voice 4] I'll hate you forever for saying that!
-[male voice 5] Lazily concealed. -[female voice] Vile. Deceitful!
-[loud screeching] -Deceitful!
[male voices] Morf!
[male voice 6] Judgment should be judged.
[male voice 7] It is a monumental failure.
[voices echoing] Morf!
[male voice 8] Ricky Blane is the classic case of presenting a poser as cutting edge.
translation.ko: '리키 블레인은 가짜를 최고인 양 소개하는 전형적인 경우예요'

translation.en: [gallery owner] Sorry for the delay. Our computer crashed.
We're-- We'll start it now.
[whimpering] What did I just hear?
Nothing. This is a soundproof room.
translation.ko: 아무 소리 없었어요 여긴 방음 처리된 방이에요

translation.en: Voi...
Voices.
I've no idea.
Mysticete is a symphony of whale intonation

translation.ko: 마리아나 해구의 심해 6천 미터 깊이에서 녹음됐죠

translation.en: You are up for this?
[Morf] I am seeing things.
[breath trembling] I'm hearing things.
Unexplainable things.
Impossible things.
And this is hard to admit

translation.ko: 유치한 믿음 따위는 신뢰하지 않는 사람으로서

translation.en: But something truly goddamn strange is going on!
translation.ko: 근데 정말로 이상한 일들이 일어나고 있단 말이에요!

translation.en: What happened to Bryson?
According to the police, he had an accident

I spoke to the police.
They have video surveillance of the night that Bryson went missing.
translation.ko: 브라이슨이 실종되던 그날 밤에 CCTV가 촬영됐더군요

translation.en: He was loading crates of art into his truck.
Okay.
What was in those crates?
translation.ko: 그 상자 안에 들어있던 게 뭐였어요?

translation.en: And all this relates how?
Dease!
His altered mental state, tortured soul, phases of the goddamn moon!
translation.ko: 디즈의 쇠약해진 정신 상태 고통 받은 영혼 젠장맞을 달의 위상!

translation.en: [shouting] I don't know how!
These deaths.
The disappearance.
Everything that is now happening,
it's all connected to his art.
[breathing heavily] Imbued with some spirit...
translation.ko: 작품에 어떤 영혼이 깃든 것 같아요

translation.en: cr... created out of some vital ideal.
It's a bit Baroque, don't you think?
-I came here to warn you. -Okay. [chuckles]
You know what? It's been a fucked-up few weeks!
But listen to yourself!
I spoke to the building owners doing research.
They were surprised
to hear Dease's art was being sold.
translation.ko: 디즈 작품들이 팔리고 있다는 얘기 듣더니 말이죠

translation.en: Apparently,
he left explicit instructions that it all be destroyed.
translation.ko: 디즈가 자신의 작품을 모두 없애 달라는 메모를 남겼대요

translation.en: -What are you saying? -[yelling] Stop selling Dease!
translation.ko: - 뭐라는 거야? - 디즈 작품 판매를 중단해요!

translation.en: -It's an eight-figure collection... -[sighs deeply]
...and you want me to stop selling over some spirit?
I am writing an article about this.
translation.ko: 이 내용에 대한 기사를 쓸 거예요

translation.en: About Dease, his past, his methods, everything that has gone down.
translation.ko: 디즈에 대해서, 그의 과거, 기법 일어난 모든 일들에 대해서요

translation.en: -Well, you'll kill your career. -Get rid of it.
Box it all, all of it away.
That's what I'm doing.
All art is dangerous, Morf.
[Rhodora] Oh, it's just been a feeding frenzy since the debut.
translation.ko: 데뷔 이후로 엄청난 구매 경쟁이 있었어요

translation.en: What's changed is we ran new metrics and realized that

translation.ko: 시장에 내놓을 수 있는 작품을 더 찾았어요

translation.en: I sent you six Dease JPEGs,
translation.ko: 여섯 점의 디즈 작품을 JPEG으로 보냈어요

translation.en: all available for immediate purchase at the quoted price

translation.ko: 상당한 가격 상승을 기대하실 수 있을 거예요

translation.en: All of them. Well, that's swell.
I'll send the papers.
Okay. Yeah.
I'll see you in Basel.
[Josephina] What's going on?
We closed the first phase on Dease. Why are we selling more?
translation.ko: 디즈 첫 판매를 마쳤잖아요 왜 더 판매하는 거예요?

translation.en: Morf is hell-bent on writing a story.
He's connecting Bryson's disappearance
and Jon and Gretchen's deaths to the Dease art.
He believes they're somehow channeling some sort of...
translation.ko: 작품들에서 어떤 힘이 나온다고 생각하나 봐

translation.en: spirit.
Spirit? [stammers]
What kind of spirit?
I don't know the varieties.
So he writes some batshit story. Who cares?
translation.ko: 말도 안 되는 이야기를 쓰나 본데, 누가 신경 쓰겠어요?

translation.en: We don't sell durable goods, we peddle perception.
translation.ko: 물건 파는 것도 아니고 우리가 하는 일은 인식에 대한 거잖아

translation.en: Thin as a bubble.
Call your buyers, sell as much Dease as you can before he posts something.
translation.ko: 구매자들에게 전화해서 최대한 팔아 봐 모프가 글을 올리기 전에 말이야

translation.en: -Who's next? -You have Roxy on one.
[Rhodora] Hey, babe. Circling back on you wanting some museum-quality Dease.
translation.ko: 잘 지냈어? 미술관 수준의 디즈 작품 때문에 다시 전화했지

translation.en: Baby, that's raw silk. Your shoes.
Pop this.
You've got strong hands.
You ever look at this painting?
You ever notice anything about this painting?
translation.ko: 이 그림에서 뭐 느낀 거 없어?

translation.en: You look at it long enough and it moves.
-Mmm. -It's alive.
-I've just sold it. -What? I would have bought it.
translation.ko: - 막 팔았어 - 뭐라고? 내가 샀을 텐데

translation.en: You couldn't afford it.
We don't want it. Trust me, I'm doing you a favor.
translation.ko: 우린 필요 없어 내 말 들어 자기에게 좋은 일이야

translation.en: -[moans] -I gotta get down to Traction Avenue.
-I thought we were spending the night in. -Yeah.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 같이 있을 줄 알았는데

translation.en: Something just came up, and I gotta take care of it tonight.
translation.ko: 그래, 일이 생겨서 오늘 밤에 해야 해

translation.en: You're blowing me off.
-I want you to come. -[sighs]
Why do you keep calling me?
[Josephina] Why?
We break up, and you write an article to completely destroy my livelihood.
translation.ko: 우리가 헤어졌다고 그 기사를 쓰는 거야? 내 인생을 완전히 망가트릴 거냐고

translation.en: I am not doing this to get back at you.
It's Dease's art. I think any of us who profited from it are in danger.
translation.ko: 디즈 작품 때문이야 어떻게든 이득을 본 사람은 위험해

translation.en: So, you just blasted it out there?
Jesus Christ. I am reading it right now.
Are you aware that you've completely lost your mind?
We don't realize the value of friends until they're gone.
translation.ko: 친구를 잃기 전에는 소중함을 모르는 법이야

translation.en: I still consider you a friend, Josephina.
[shouting] Go fuck yourself and lose my number!
Well, fine, then. All right.
[Coco] Hello?
It's Morf.
Oh, hi.
A timetable is moved up.
I'm storing some art and I'm leaving immediately.
I need an assistant part-time here while I'm gone.
translation.ko: 내가 없는 동안 파트타임 조수가 필요해요

translation.en: -Well, I'm available. -Yeah. Can you start tonight?
translation.ko: 네, 할 수 있어요 오늘 밤에 시작할 수 있나요?

translation.en: Um, I guess so. Sure.
I need to give you the keys to my house and my storage space.
There's an overlook on Mulholland, right off Cahuenga.
-I know the one. -Good. I'll meet you there.
Mr. Vandewalt. Hi.
I posted it, Coco.
And with this article, I'm... I'm...
I'm pouring gas on myself. I'm lighting a match.
translation.ko: 이제 몸에 기름을 붓고 성냥불을 켠 거나 다름없어요

translation.en: I don't have a choice.
It has been revealed to me
that there is some sort of larger power...
some entity invested in our endeavor.
translation.ko: 우리가 하는 일에 어떤 존재가 관련돼 있어요

translation.en: Invested how?
In... [breathes deeply] the violation
of inviolate rules.
Have I gone mad?
Oh, not to me.
I found both bodies.
[stammers] I'm sleeping with my lights on.
translation.ko: 불을 안 켜면 잠을 못 자요

translation.en: On top of which, if I don't land a steady job soon,
I'm gonna have to go back to Michigan.
I have to tell you something.
What?
I was Rhodora's personal assistant, right? I saw her checks, I rolled calls with her.
translation.ko: 로도라의 비서로 일했었잖아요 수표 관리도 하고 전화도 받고 그랬는데요

translation.en: I think she sometimes forgot when I was on them.
translation.ko: 로도라가 가끔은 제가 전화를 받고 있다는 사실을 잊곤 했어요

translation.en: Tell me.
Your ex-boyfriend, Ed, um...
he worked for her.
He worked her out. He's a personal trainer.
No.
No, I mean...
Rhodora paid Ed to give her advance word on your reviews.
translation.ko: 당신 비평에 대한 얘기를 미리 듣는 대가로 에드에게 돈을 줬어요

translation.en: Like, okay... He would tell her what you liked before you posted,
translation.ko: 당신이 좋아한 작품 정보를 얘기해 준 거죠

translation.en: and then she'd make buys.
Do I still have the job?
translation.ko: 저 계속 일할 수 있는 건가요?

translation.en: Here are the keys to my storage space. I need everything itemized that's there.
translation.ko: 여기 창고 키예요 거기 있는 작품들을 모두 기록해주세요

translation.en: Okay.
Is my car safe out there?
How the fuck should I know?
Where did you go?
This is Ben. He runs my old artist collective.
translation.ko: 여긴 벤이야, 전에 있던 예술가 공동체를 운영하셔

translation.en: Hey.
[scoffs] Lovely. Can we go now?
I'm staying.
But I don't really like this place.
Yeah, I'm talking longer timeline.
I'm leaving Rhodora, her gallery.
